comment: She is amazing. She is so helpful and is willing to do anything to help you follow you passion and how to become a leader. Take her every chance you get.

This professor is EXTREMELY helpful and does anything and everything in her power to accommodate and work with you. She's very out going, social, and laid back. You'll have a lot of fun in her classes. However, don't get me wrong, even though she is a great professor, you WILL be doing service projects, you will have to study, and do work. 5/5. :)

Amazing class! This was not in my "plan" but, I am so glad that I took the class. It literally changed my path in education and the workplace. HIGHLY recommend for everyone. The Professor is accessible, knowledgeable, and passionate. There is no better class at KSU
